Name: InstrumentName
Description: A name for the Instrument. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the Instrument. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the Instrument. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: TypeOfInstrument
Description: Describes the type of the instrument, according to the documenters type classification. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary. The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (TypeOfInstrument) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: ExternalInstrumentLocation
Description: A reference to an external representation of the data collection instrument, such as an image of a questionnaire or programming script.

Name: ControlConstructReference
Description: A reference to the Sequence control construct that initiates the flow of the instrument content.

Name: FieldedLanguages
Description: Language in which the Instrument is fielded. Include all options as separate items. Language can be specified by region, for example en-AU. Supports the use of a controlled vocabulary.

Name: DevelopmentResultsReference
Description: Reference to the development implementation results which gave rise to this version of the object. TypeOfObject should be DevelopmentResults.
